org.pojava.datetime

Class LocalConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pojava.datetime.LocalConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDateTimeConfig

    public class LocalConfig
extends Object
implements IDateTimeConfig
    LocalConfig is a wrapper class providing a cheap equivalent to the global instance of DateTimeConfig with one or more methods (e.g. TimeZone) overridden.

      • isDmyOrder

        public boolean isDmyOrder()
        Description copied from interface: IDateTimeConfig
        British DD/MM/YYYY vs. Western MM/DD/YYYY
        Specified by:
        isDmyOrder in interface IDateTimeConfig
        Returns:
        True if parser interprets DD/MM/YYYY vs MM/DD/YYYY.

      • getTzMap

        public Map<String,String> getTzMap()
        Description copied from interface: IDateTimeConfig
        Map of timezones and their offsets. You can customize the default map to add your own timezones by referencing other timezones.
        Specified by:
        getTzMap in interface IDateTimeConfig
        Returns:
        TimeZones.
